Dance After Concert
The annual Glee Club Dance
will follow the concert. All tickets are $1.50 per couple and may
be obtained from club members.
The dance is slated to start at
10 p.m. at the Homewood gym.
Music will be supplied by the
Bluejays.
On April 10 the club will travel
to Atlantic City to sing at the
Hotel Dennis.
Sing For Alumni
The club will sing April 24 before the New York Hopkins Alumni Association at Carl Fischer Hall.
A dance at the Hopkins Club will
follow the concert.

Correction
On March 12 the NewsLetter
published a headline reading
"IRC plans lectures on Asia for.
spring, McAdams quits club."
Mr. McAdams did not resign
from the IRO, but merely from
the office of Corresponding Secretary. The News-Letter regrets
the error.

JHU Coach Lacrosse
Can't Decide Stickmen Impressive
On Starter In Practice Workouts

No one pitcher has stepped
forth to "fill the boots" of the
graduated Charley Blades, baseball coach Bob Bilgrav asserted
last week.

By HOWARD WASKOW
Assistant Sports Editor

Every poet in every age has written of the coming of the
spring. Most of the time the verse-makers tell of budding trees,
bright green grass, wondering hearts, and on and on and on.
But Hopkins students traditionally have a different outlook on the
advent of the springtime. It means to them one thing, a sensation
expressed in the following mental wanderings (rhymed of course)
of a lyrical sportswriter.

The JHU coach, who has been
looking over varsity candidates in
a series of intra-squad games,
plans to pick his starting hurler
for the season opener, against
Rutgers next Friday, from the
group of Gene Lovell, Earl Slaybaugh, and Jim Clark. According
to Bilgrav, these three will bear
the brunt of the pitching load this
season.

The Blue Jay stickmen scrimmaged the University of
Baltimore last Saturday and, although no formal score was kept,
it was generally conceded that Hopkins had the upper hand
throughout.
Sparked by the attack trio of John Boynton, Bob Taylor,

Every poet in every age has written of the coming of the

season.
